senses.sense_definition: A method of joining materials, especially plastic pipes, by melting them together using electricity.

examples.text: The construction team used <w>electrofusion</w> welding to connect the gas pipelines securely.
Proper preparation of the pipe surface is critical for successful <w>electrofusion</w>.

senses.sense_definition: The technique of fusing plant protoplasts or cells together by applying electrical stimulation.

examples.text: Scientists utilized <w>electrofusion</w> to create hybrid cells in the laboratory experiment.
Protoplast <w>electrofusion</w> is a valuable tool for genetic modification in plants.
